title: Need font name
content:
Hi.... I need the name of this font.... Please!!!!  
Thanks....

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017003115/http:/typophile.com/files/image_56.jpg) | 33.09 KB |
author: Bookie8895

comments.content:
This is **[Zierinitialen 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017003115/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Zierinitialen%201%20-%20Regular&fid=a2642626190a0584fa6460cda6212e22&fsize=60&text=HOPE&fit=1)** free font by Dieter Steffmann (Typographer Mediengestaltun)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017003115/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
